alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Itasca, northwestern Aitkin, east central Cass and southwestern St. Louis Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 653 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Gunn, to 7 miles north of Longville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Warba around 705 PM CDT. Swan River and Remer around 710 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Cohasset, Toivola, Pokegama Lake, Pokegama Dam, Grand Rapids and Gunn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Cass; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
